title: Yellow Leaf Bay Beach Day
shortDescription: Relax on the white sands of Taniti’s most famous beach.
longDescription: Located just outside Taniti City, Yellow Leaf Bay offers gentle waves, warm sand, and stunning sunsets. Beach chair rentals, local snack shacks, and paddleboard rentals are available.
imageTitle: Tourists relaxing on Yellow Leaf Bay beach
imageAltText: White sand beach with turquoise water and beachgoers

title: Volcano Summit Hike
shortDescription: Take a guided hike to Taniti’s active volcano.
longDescription: Led by certified local guides, this hike to the volcanic rim offers breathtaking views and geological insights. Safety gear and refreshments are provided.
imageTitle: Hikers approaching the rim of Taniti’s volcano
imageAltText: Group of hikers on a trail with the volcano in the background

title: Rainforest Canopy Walk
shortDescription: Walk among the treetops in Taniti’s lush rainforest.
longDescription: This elevated walkway offers unique perspectives on the flora and fauna of the tropical rainforest. Great for photography and bird watching.
imageAltText: Tourists walking on a canopy bridge above dense forest

title: Cultural Tour of Taniti City
shortDescription: Experience native architecture and island traditions.
longDescription: This walking tour showcases historic Tanitian buildings, traditional crafts, and local storytelling. Includes stops at artisan markets and historic sites.
imageTitle: Guided tour through Taniti City’s cultural district
imageAltText: Tour group walking past native-style architecture and shops

title: Sunset Harbor Cruise
shortDescription: Sail through Taniti’s tranquil harbor at sunset.
longDescription: Enjoy island music, tropical drinks, and dolphin sightings on this relaxing evening cruise. Great for families and couples.
imageTitle: Boat sailing into the sunset near Taniti harbor
imageAltText: Catamaran with people enjoying the sunset on open water
